soy.name: Soy
soy.effect: Used as a hypoallergenic source of protein & carbs
soy.details: Cats can develop allergies to it later in life

corn.name: Corn
corn.effect: Used as a source of carbs & fiber
corn.details: Metabolizes into sugar in the gut

wheat.name: Wheat
wheat.effect: Used as a source of carbs
wheat.details: Common allergen for both dogs & cats

toco.name: Tocopherols (mixed or non-mixed)
toco.effect: A food preservative used to add Vitamin E to products
toco.details: Your pet may be allergic since its derived sources (veggies, nuts or fish) are not listed on the label

la2p.name: L-ascorbyl-2-polyphosphate
la2p.details: There have been no controversies thus far.

msbc.name: Menadione sodium bisulfate complex
msbc.details: A known carcinogenic & also technically illegal since AAFCO only allows it to be used in poultry feed

p1.name: Meat
p1.effect: Clean muscle (skeletal, tongue, diaphragm, heart, esophagus) from animals
p1.details: May or may not include fat, skin, nerves, & blood vessels

p2.name: Meat meal
p2.effect: Rendered (or processed) product from animal tissues
p2.details: Excludes hair, hooves, horn, hide, manure, or GI contents

p3.name: Meat and bone meal
p3.effect: Rendered (or processed) product from animal tissues & bones
p3.details: Excludes hair, hooves, horn, hide, manure, or GI contents

p4.name: Meat by-product
p4.effect: Clean, non-rendered (not processed) parts of animals other than muscle, usually consisting of organs, blood, & bone

p5.name: Meat digest
p5.effect: Materials resulting from chemical or enzymatic degradation of clean animal tissue
p5.details: Excludes hair, horns, teeth, hooves, & feathers

bha.name: Butylated Hydroxyanisole (BHA)
bha.details: Labelled as a carcinogen in California & banned in the EU

bht.name: Butylated Hydroxytoluene (BHT)
bht.details: Not concluded to be a carcinogen but still banned in Japan, Romania, Sweden & Australia

eth.name: Ethoxyquin
eth.details: Not concluded to be a carcinogen but still banned in the EU & Australia

const templateTitleText.text: The product is at least 25% ${ing1}. It cannot exceed 95%.
The product is at least 25% ${ing1}. It cannot exceed 95%. ${ing2} makes up at least 3%.
The product is at least 25% ${ing1}. It cannot exceed 95%. ${ing2} & ${ing3} make up at least 3% each.
The product does not have to include any amount of actual ${ing1}. It can be substituted with ${ing1} stock instead.
